Package via.sep3.group11.tier2.logicInterfaces

Interface HostInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
HostLogic
public interface HostInterface
Interface with methods representing actions that can be made by a Host in the system. This interface is to be implemented in a way, so business logic is applied to the calls made from the application-tier before they are passed on to the data-tier. All methods are to be called from the Application-tier, and can be seen as a way of controlling access to the data-tier.
Version:
27/11-2022
Author:
Christian Hougaard Pedersen

  • Method Details

    • RegisterHost

      Host RegisterHost(HostRegisterDTO dto) throws NotUniqueException, ValidationException
      Method used to register a new host in the system. The implementation of this should perform relevant business logic on the call, and return a Host-object from the Data tier.
      Parameters:
      dto - : a Domain Transfer Object containing all relevant attributes needed to create a new Host.
      Returns:
      The created host object.
      Throws:
      NotUniqueException
      ValidationException

    • LoginHost

      Host LoginHost(LoginDTO dto) throws ValidationException
      Method used to login an already existing host. The implementation of this should validate the information in the DTO, and return an object representation of the Host logging in.
      Parameters:
      dto - : A domain transfer object containing the email and password of the host trying to log in.
      Returns:
      An object representation of the host logged in.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if no Host corresponding to the email in the dto is found, or if the password and email given does not match.

    • AddHousing

      Housing AddHousing(HousingCreationDTO dto) throws ValidationException
      Method used to add a housing object to the system.
      Parameters:
      dto - : a domain transfer object containing all relevant attributes about the housing to add (including address), and the email of the owner of the housing.
      Returns:
      An object representation of the Housing created.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if any validation of the domain transfer object fails.
